channel.title: Detecting trades?
channel.description: does anyone have a procedure to find the text when someone trades you and then click on it...It can't seem to find it, no matter what I do...help?

item.title: Detecting trades?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Isn’t it implemented into SRL?

… Yea I just looked. It has its own section in SRL.

trade.scar

function GetTraderName: String;
By: masquerader
Description:
Returns the name of the person you are trading with.

function AcceptTrade: Boolean;
By: masquerader
Description:
Accepts the trade on the last line in the chatbox.

procedure Accept;
By: masquerader
Description:
Accepts the opened trade.

procedure Decline;
By: masquerader
Description:
Declines the opened trade.

function Waiting: Boolean;
By: masquerader
Description:
Returns true if you are waiting for the other player to accept the trade.

function PlayerAccepted: Boolean;
By: masquerader
Description:
Returns true if the other player accepted the trade.

function CheckItem(them: Boolean; name: String): Integer;
By: masquerader modified by Pyro and Cheesehunk
Description:
returns number item at second screen
it might mess up because it goes out of the box/off the screen,
but thats not my fault
make the first letter capital, and the rest lowercase

Read full topic
